mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket_changes(change_type, ticket_id, order_id, target_trip_id, target_seat_id, change_fee, refund_amount, process_status, note) VALUES(#{changeType}, #{ticketId}, #{orderId}, #{targetTripId}, #{targetSeatId}, #{changeFee}, #{refundAmount}, #{processStatus}, #{note})
mapper.update: UPDATE ticket_changes SET change_type = #{changeType}, ticket_id = #{ticketId}, order_id = #{orderId}, target_trip_id = #{targetTripId}, target_seat_id = #{targetSeatId}, change_fee = #{changeFee}, refund_amount = #{refundAmount}, process_status = #{processStatus}, request_time = #{requestTime}, process_time = #{processTime}, note = #{note} WHERE change_id = #{changeId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ticket_changes WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY request_time DESC
